subheadings.rawText: Software engineering graduate with 3+ years of experience building scalable, event-driven and user-focused applications. Skilled in software testing, cloud technology, and databases. Collaborative team member seeking to leverage my technical and leadership expertise at a fast-paced innovative opportunity.

resumeItems: Minor: Project Management
Relevant Courses: Software Reliability & Testing, Databases, Software Design V, Agile Project Management
\textbf{Languages}: JavaScript, C#, SQL, Typescript, Python, Java, GO
\textbf{Frameworks and Libraries}: Angular 17, .NET 8, React, Jest, Vue, Node.js, Django, Java Spring, GraphQL.
\textbf{Cloud}: Google Cloud, AWS, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Firebase
Develop a scalable and performant microservice architecture with \textbf{AWS EC2 & Elasticache}.
Translate \textbf{user needs} into \textbf{requirements} by enabling Microsoft Clarity \textbf{user analytics}.
Collaborate with developers and co-founders to create Agile user stories and \textbf{provide estimates}.
Mentor \textbf{6} junior developers in our tech stack, performing \textbf{code reviews} and shared learning sessions.
Enabled \textbf{1000s} of users to link their Yale smart door locks to our app using third-party webhooks in GO.
Bolstered security and reduced staging costs by \textbf{20%} by configuring private networks on our \textbf{GCP infrastructure}.
Reduced \textbf{on-call} complaints by \textbf{70%} by organizing team-wide release discussions and leading process improvements.
Led \textbf{3} multi-faceted, high impact \textbf{GCP} upgrades, cooperating with my team to manage risk on tight deadlines.

subheadings.techstack: Django REST, Vue.js, Jest, MySQL, Figma
resumeItems: Engaged with stakeholders to translate requirements into \textbf{10s of prioritized stories, releases and epics}.
Developed \textbf{automated tests} for both frontend and backend services using \textbf{Jest} and Python's \textbf{unittest}.
Managed sensitive cybersecurity data by creating performant \textbf{Django REST APIs} and \textbf{MySQL migrations}.
Demonstrated my commitment to quality with a \textbf{complete ownership} of \textbf{5+} features, from design to \textbf{deployment}.
Grew our Advertising dashboard with \textbf{Angular 17} and \textbf{.NET 8}, enabling support for third-party vendors.
Reduced backend response time by \textbf{30-40%} by optimizing redundant \textbf{SQL} queries.

subheadings.techstack: React, ExpressJS, Postgres, Google Compute Engine, Yjs
resumeItems: Created a collaborative PlantUML editor, used by \textbf{50+ colleagues} for their Software Design Courses.
Enabled error-free, real-time collaboration using Yjs, eliminating the potential for merge conflicts.
Persisted encrypted designs using Redis cache and a Postgres backup for long term storage.
Architected an ML powered automatic content creation pipeline using OpenCV, MoviePy and the Reddit API.
Achieved \textbf{95% improvement} in goal-finding speed through \textbf{multithreading} and \textbf{binary search} algorithms.
